```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r library}
library(ipacs)
```

Import sheets from file containing model parameters
```{r import}
files <- import_file(
  system.file("extdata", "IPACS_20230214_fix.xlsx", package="ipacs"))

for (x in seq_along(files[[1]])){
  assign(files[[1]][x], files[[2]][[x]])
}
```

This will produce five dataframes: 
```{r, files}
print(files[[1]])
```

Recalculate mu and sigma in losA dataframe using chosen method
``` {r mu_sigma}
losA <- calculate_mu_sigma(est_method = 1, losA, sd_los = 3)
```
